identifier.label: Name / ID (eindeutig)
identifier.description: Unique Identifier of this ressource. If applicable, should use the milesian naming conventions; i.e. Area, Year, Trench...; e.g. for contexts: HU19_A_01 for Context 1 in Trench A in the year 2019 on Humeitepe.

measuringPointID.label: Measuring-Point-IS
measuringPointID.description: ID of the data in the Totalstation, empty if not applicable

localization.label: Origin of Surveying Data
localization.description: How was the spatial data acquired?

localization-description.label: Commentary on Surveying Data
localization-description.description: Either enter a (topographical) description of localization, if only that exists, or record the point numbers or surveying data in the appropriate format.

FotoNr.label: Photograph-ID(s)
FotoNr.description: List the IDs of Fotographs according to the paper form. This can also encompass fotos that are not included in the database itself, but instead archived together with the documentation.

DrawingNr.label: Drawing-ID(s)
DrawingNr.description: List the IDs of drawings according to the paper form. This can also encompass drawings that are not included in the database itself, but instead archived together with the documentation.

hasDisturbance.label: Disturbed
hasDisturbance.description: Is the trench/section/context/unit disturbed? (i.e. can some finds be non-indicative?)

distinguishingCriteria.label: Distinguishing criteria (in relation to surrounding contexts)

layerClassification.label: Befundart
layerClassification.description: Um welche Art von Befund handelt es sich?

isNatural.label: Natürliche Entstehung
isNatural.description: Ist die Schicht natürlich? ('Ja' z. B. bei Erosion, 'nein' wenn anthropogen)

contextDescription.label: Beschreibung des Befundes
contextDescription.description: Entspricht dem Feld 'Kurzbeschreibung' auf dem Befundzettel

soilType.label: Bodenanteile
soilType.description: Partikel des Bodens nach bodenkundlicher Anleitung, bitte erläutern und Anteile in der Beschreibung angeben

layerSoilContentDesc.label: Beschreibung des Bodens
layerSoilContentDesc.description: Nach dem Formular: Farbe / Bodenart / Konsistenz

layerFinds.label: Funde
layerFinds.description: Grober Überblick über die im Befund enthaltenen Funde

layerFindsOther.label: Funde (Ergänzungen)
layerFindsOther.description: Grober Überblick über die im Befund enthaltenen Funde

layerDatingIndication.label: Datierende Elemente
layerDatingIndication.description: Erläuterung der Basis für die Datierung

storagePlaceOther.label: Other Storage Place
storagePlaceOther.description: Please enter place of storage here if it is not an option in the list above.

YearOfFind.label: Year (in case of Altfund)
YearOfFind.description: Year in which the object has been found or first recorded, in case of Altfunde

material.label: Material
material.description: The material the sculpture mainly consists of.

materialdescr.label: Material: Description
materialdescr.description: Platz für zusätzliche Erläuterungen und Beschreibungen

bodypart.label: Fragment of Sculpture
bodypart.description: Which parts of the Sculpture are preserved?

name.label: Honorand
name.description: Sofern bekannt ist hier der Name der von der Skulptur abgebildeten Person anzugeben.

reused.label: Reused?
reused.description: Ist die Statue wiederverwendet bzw. nachbearbeitet?

headheight.label: Height of Head to Crown (in cm)

viewDirection.label: View in direction of ...
viewDirection.description: Direction the Photograph was shot in.
